name: C. Vasilije in Cacak
statement:
Aca and Milovan, two fellow competitive programmers, decided to give
Vasilije a problem to test his skills.Vasilije is given three positive
integers: n, k, and x, and he has to determine if he can choose k
distinct integers between 1 and n, such that their sum is equal to
x.Since Vasilije is now in the weirdest city in Serbia where Aca and
Milovan live, Cacak, the problem seems weird to him. So he needs your
help with this problem.
